TextView.android:text: WORK EXPERIENCE: Admit One Product, Irvine, CA- System Administrator FEB 2020- MAR 2020 ● Administered Linux server systems, carried out database queries and updates, deployed data servers, wrote programs in PHP to provide the results of data queries, deployed all customer equipment’s, managed files and backups, and performed other system tasks as assigned. Implementation and driving of solutions from start to finish. Assessment of products and ability to determine ideal solutions ● Administered - Databases, Amazon AWS Virtual Environment, Windows Server, Active Directory Pro-dex Inc, Irvine, CA — Quality Assurance Admin JUN 2019- FEB 2020 ● Maintained and controlled the quality of electrically driven medical devices. Change management development. Analyzed data, generated reports, maintained databases on MS access. Updated Quality Procedures, documentation, technical writing, compile reports for internal use. ● Kept track and maintained records of the router for each device company manufactures using Made2Manage ERP tool. Fujitsu Consulting India, Pune, MH — Oracle Database Administrator JUL 2016 - MAR 2019 ● Worked on the project which involved 16x5 production Oracle DBA support, administration, and maintenance of 200+ Oracle databases on Sun Solaris, Linux and Windows server platforms. The support environment included Development, Staging/QA and Production databases and consists of various support teams. We supported four different clients at the same time. ● Monitored and responded to the alerts/incidents generated on the client database. Performed daily checks including regular check of alert logs for ORA- errors, monitoring backups, managing disk space/tablespace, managing roles and privileges for users. ● Performed tasks like- Export/import, RMAN backup and recovery (Full database and point in time recovery), rebuild of database, patching, upgradation, running reports on server level, query optimization and performance tuning. ● Worked on disaster recovery, ASM, RAC and dataguard. ● Maintained client documentation including database topology, server inventory. Creating SOPs for future reference Involvement in all DB related client calls TECHNICAL SKILLS: ● BI, Data Analysis and Visualization: MS Excel, Power BI ● Applications: MS Access, MS Office 365, MS PowerPoint ● Databases and Frameworks: MYSQL database, Oracle Database- 9i, 10g,11g,12c ● Languages: SQL, PL/SQL, Python, C++, Basic Embedded C, JCL, HTML, CSS, Javascript ● Platforms: Linux, Solaris, Windows ● Tools: ServiceNow, Control-m, Made2Manage(ERP tool), Tivoli monitoring ● Certification: Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Associate certification ● AWS: S3, EC2, Elastic Beanstalk, Amplify, Lambda, RDS, Redshift, EBS ● Frameworks: React.js, Node.js, BootStrap ● Methodology: ITIL, SDLC- Agile, Waterfall, DevOps ● Certification: Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Foundation 2020 Certified
